title: Tour Daily Podcast, stage 12: Get by with a little help from the wind
content:
Tour Daily Podcast, stage 12: Get by with a little help from the wind

What was billed as a sprinters stage was flipped on its head when the wind took control.

Ruth Winder reflects on an aggressive day and a near-miss at the Giro Donne stage 7.

author: Abby Mickey
